item.title: White House insists Biden, Harris have 'one of most successful administrations in history' despite 2024 loss
item.description: The White House released a memo that hailed the Biden-Harris administration as one of the most successful in history, despite losing the 2024 election...

item.title: Biden does his final White House Thanksgiving turkey pardoning: 'Last time to speak here as your president'
item.description: President Biden said the Thanksgiving turkey pardoning at the White House Monday is "my last time to speak here as your president during the season."

item.title: Special Counsel Smith seeks to dismiss Jan. 6 charges against Trump
item.description: Special Counsel Jack Smith is asking a judge to drop all charges against President-elect Donald Trump stemming from Smith's investigation into the Jan...

item.title: Denver mayor says heâ€™s prepared to go to jail over opposition to Trump deportations of illegal immigrants
item.description: Denver Mayor Mike Johnston says he is prepared to got to jail over the opposition to the mass deportation plan to be launched by President-elect Trump...

item.title: NY Dem Rep. Ritchie Torres dubs Gov. Kathy Hochul 'the new Joe Biden,' warns of potential 2026 election loss
item.description: Democratic Rep. Ritchie Torres described New York Gov. Kathy Hochul as "the new Joe Biden" and warned of a possible 2026 gubernatorial election loss.
